mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT(SUBSTR(B.NEW_ENT_ID, 1, 11), LPAD( (SUBSTR(B.NEW_ENT_ID, 12, 5)) + 1 , 5, '0')) , CONCAT('SCHL', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '00001') ) AS NEW_ENT_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(A.ENT_ID) AS NEW_ENT_ID FROM ENT1300 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ENT_ID LIKE CONCAT('ENT', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '%') ) B
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS1100 ( MENU_ID , TGT_ID , ENT_TYPE_CD , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP ) SELECT MENU_ID, #usrId# AS USR_ID , MENU_TYPE_CD AS ENT_TYPE_CD , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{usrId}, #{accessIp}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{usrId}, #{accessIp} FROM SYS1000 WHERE MENU_TYPE_CD = '01' AND LVL != 0
